page.title: 07Miners Wives (cont.)
page.content: They gained a new respect for themselves and their own abilities. They felt equal with the men on the picket-line _ and many did join the pickets. Most of all they gave the men the will to continue the strike without the worry of "hungry bellies". The strike is now over but the women have not found it easy to return to their passive role. Many of them are still active in fund-rasing for charity. Some have become members of trade unions and political parties and their husbands _ well they are having to adjust to their well informed wives.
